TopicTitle: How does the generator for hire-able Kerbals function?

Articles.Content: I'm just curious, how does the random generator for hire-able Kerbals work? When does the game run the random calculation? How often does it perform the random generation? How many Kerbals can be generated at one time?
Can you be more specific ? Are you talking about names, stupidity or courage?

Can you be more specific ? Are you talking about names, stupidity or courage?

Yes, no, and both in a manner of speaking.

What I am wanting to know is when/how the game decides to add Kerbals to the hire-able roster (I am assuming it's a random number that dictates when it chooses, and then another random number(s) to decide the name and stats, but I have no idea for sure).

Does that make any more sense?
Probably the same way it did it before. Only now instead of coming up with 3 random kerbals every time you start a mission, it comes up with more when you run out of kerbals to hire.

It doesn't wait until you run out of Kerbals to hire though, which is why I am even more puzzled on how it works.
